scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node" "npm run browser-sync"
scripts.watch-sass: node-sass -r -w --output-style expanded src/public/css/main.scss dist/public/css/main.css --source-map dist/public/css/main.css.map && postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'latest 2 versions' < dist/public/css/main.css && cleancss dist/public/css/main.css
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
